subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joe Pavelski scored the first of three straight goals by San Jose, and Antti Niemi stopped 20 shots to lead the visiting Sharks to a 4-2 win over the St. Louis Blues.
snippet: Joe Pavelski scored the first of three straight goals by San Jose, and Antti Niemi stopped 20 shots to lead the visiting Sharks to a 4-2 win over the St. Louis Blues.
